Reviews.Title: “A bare bones, but perfectly okay place to stay for a weekend in a great location.”
Reviews.Author: oliviamarion
Reviews.Content: werent expecting due reviews read arrived pleased werent bad yes rust burning brought own sheet pillow yes door cut bottom slanted odd angle toes fit basic services provided bare bones breakfast service weekend booked average type hotel feeling homesick reasonable folks feeling fine stay

Reviews.Content: clean shared bathrooms bathrooms tiny thats expect centre london sheets changed daily dont expect service perfect location victoria station buckingham palace parliament familyowned hotel staff smile lot helpful breakfast awful healthy diet carbohydrates wouldnt recommend stay money pay decent hotel compared hotels choice
